entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (mtp_hideout_access_old_meatlump.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_11: It's not that easy. If you want to retire from being a Meatlump, you have to bring in at least one new person to take your place. But I don't know anyone.
entries.s_13: What if I took your place?
entries.s_15: Oh, really? That would be nice, I think. Then I could just sleep all day and watch holovids. Oh, but you'll need to speak with my lieutenant. Her name is Kaiya. She's usually somewhere around Coronet.
entries.s_24: I don't know. Why not? Kaiya likes it when I smash things. She's my lieutenant...Kaiya is. But I don't know why I do it any more. I think I'd like to stop.
entries.s_28: Ho hum. Smashing stuff is fun, I guess, but I think maybe I've had enough.
entries.s_29: Oh, don't mind me. I'm just smashing this machine thing.
entries.s_4: I think the first thing I'm going to do now that I'm retired is go find some seashells on the beach.
